classification.task_goal: Rewrite product descriptions with the same format while avoiding plagiarism.
primary_constraints: Maintain the same format as the original text.
Avoid plagiarism in the rewritten content.
classification.reasoning: The AI initially provided responses that were too similar to the original text, which constituted a violation of the plagiarism constraint. However, the user prompted the AI to rewrite the content without plagiarism, leading to successful repairs in subsequent turns.
